title: Experienced Carpenter
description: Join our residential and commercial carpentry projects. Skilled in woodworking and blueprint reading required.
shortDescription: Skilled carpenter needed for ongoing projects.

title: House Painter
description: Interior and exterior painting for residential buildings. Must know paint types and safety protocols.

title: HVAC Technician
description: Maintain, install, and repair HVAC systems in residential and commercial buildings.
shortDescription: HVAC expert needed for maintenance and install work.

title: Electrician
description: Licensed electrician with experience in wiring, lighting, and panels for commercial buildings.

title: Tile Setter
description: Install tiles on floors and walls. Must be precise and experienced with cutting tools.
